507860.name: Robotpencil Presents: Brushwork Strategies for Materials
507860.description:
Brush work strategies for materials. In this video we cover a few final ideas to how to approach materials. This one is short and sweet, but includes how to go from grey to color, with materials in mind.

Topics Covered:

Hard versus Soft brushes

Small versus Large strokes

Adding color after greyscale paintings.
507860.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
